com.lavanya.escalade.repository

Interface SiteRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Site,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Site,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Site,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Site>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Site,java.lang.Integer>

    @Repository
public interface SiteRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Site,java.lang.Integer>
    Repository extending JPA repository for persistence of Site object.
    Author:
    lavanya

    • Method Detail

      • findByUserId

        @Query(value="select u from Site u where u.userId = ?1")
java.util.List<Site> findByUserId(int userId)
        Query to retrieve the list of site of a specific user.
        Parameters:
        userId - for id of the user of interest.
        Returns:
        List of Site.

      • updateTag

        @Query(value="update Site u set u.tagged=?2 where u.id = ?1")
 @Modifying
void updateTag(int id,
                                                                                           boolean tagged)
        Query to update the column is_tagged in site table.
        Parameters:
        id - for id of the site of interest to be or not be tagged.
        tagged - boolean to add or not a tag a specific site.

      • findDistinctDepartment

        @Query(value="select distinct u.department from Site u order by u.department asc")
java.util.List<java.lang.String> findDistinctDepartment()
        Query to retrieve distinct values in the column department from table site.
        Returns:
        List of String which are distinct values of department saved in database.

      • findDistinctAreasNumber

        @Query(value="select distinct u.areasNumber from Site u order by u.areasNumber asc")
java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> findDistinctAreasNumber()
        Query to retrieve distinct values in the column areas_number from table site.
        Returns:
        List of Integer which are distinct values of areas number saved in database.

      • findDistinctRoutesNumber

        @Query(value="select distinct a.routesNumber from Site u join u.areas a order by a.routesNumber asc")
java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> findDistinctRoutesNumber()
        Query to retrieve distinct values in the column routes_number from table area.
        Returns:
        List of Integer which are distinct values of routes number saved in database.

      • findFilteredSite

        @Query(value="select distinct u from Site u left join u.areas a where (:#{#search.keyword} is null or concat(u.siteName, u.region, u.city, a.areaName) like concat(\'%\',:#{#search.keyword},\'%\')) and (:#{#search.department} is null or u.department = :#{#search.department}) and (:#{#search.areasNumber} is null or u.areasNumber = :#{#search.areasNumber}) and (:#{#search.routesNumber} is null or a.routesNumber = :#{#search.routesNumber})")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Site> findFilteredSite(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="search")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Search search)
        Query to retrieve a list of sites using pagination based or not with the following filters criteria: keyword that can be site name or site region or site areas name or site department number or site areas number and site routes number.
        Parameters:
        pageable - for pagination
        search - to give information on what element to filter the site search.
        Returns:
        Page of Site.

      • countByUserId

        java.lang.Long countByUserId(int userId)
        Query to count the amount of sites created by a given user identified by its id.
        Parameters:
        userId - for id of the user of interest.
        Returns:
        total amount of sites created by a particular user.
